4307640.name: Tooned Out Duo Dippin Demo
4307640.description:
ABOUT THIS DEMO

This demo includes an early playable portion of Tooned Out Duo Dippin, showcasing the core arcade racing gameplay, drifting mechanics, characters, and weapons. Some game modes, tracks, features, and content available in the full version are not included in this demo.

----------------------------------------

ABOUT THIS GAME

Welcome to Tooned Out Duo Dippin!!!

This game is a Final Master Project by Game Master Silent Shadow.

Tooned Out Duo Dippin is an all-out fantasy arcade racing experience focused on aggressive driving, high-speed drifting, and chaotic combat.

Try to beat all the cups in the Grand Prix on Master Mode if you think you can drift and handle the aggression.

Pick up weapons and blast your way to first place.

Dippin with two people on one kart or vehicle adds a unique cooperative twist.

Play aggressively and take control of the race — don’t let it control you.

Compete across different game modes.

Memorize the tracks and take advantage of their designs.

Teleport through players, objects, and walls.

Teleport through the roof or beneath the ground.

Instant reverse to regain directional control.

Change the soundtrack while Duo Dippin, or hang out in Jukebox Mode and vibe to the soundtrack.

This game is a body of work derived from years of development and iteration.

Become a monster player in this all-out fantasy arcade racing experience.

Tooned Out Duo Dippin

*具有完全音频支持的语言
